name: Taskbaric
body:
_Taskbaric_ is a small program with a simple purpose: to iconize Windows taskbar buttons. _Taskbaric_ works on Windows XP and Vista.

Visit _Taskbaric_'s main [http://sites.google.com/site/taskbaric/ site] for instructions and more information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
